raw_answer.rationale: Annotated numeric values near bars do not align with bar heights, indicating deliberate or erroneous misrepresentation of the underlying data.

trace.model_output_excerpt:
THOUGHT: The chart is annotated with numeric values near bars, which allows checking consistency between bar lengths and printed values. I will run a bar-value consistency check to see if the annotations misrepresent bar heights.

ACTION: {"tool":"bar_value_consistency","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"bar_orientation":"vertical"}}
